condition: Circular zodiac diagram. Six concentric circles forming three narrow bands. Colors present. Text in circular rings readable with minor uncertainty marks in EVA transcription.

center.illustration: Goat-like animal nibbling at a bush, standing on scalloped ground

outer_band.description: 10 nymphs in barrels, each with a star/flower and a label

inner_band.description: 5 nymphs in barrels, each with a star/flower and a label

text_rings.middle_ring: L12 -- continuous circular text (with gap at end)

notable_readings: !!okol in L12 may be 'ostol' (bone oil) -- same as validated f88r label
Zodiac vocabulary expected to differ from pharmaceutical sections
validation_status.spatial_correlation: Labels spatially correlated with nymph positions around zodiac circle; clock positions noted

transcription_method: Direct paleographic reading from manuscript image using 7-layer constraint stack. EVA (Hermes) transcription used as reference crosswalk.
